meanings.definition: (鳥類学)始原的な鳴管。鳥類の気管分岐部に存在する、最も原始的な形態の鳴管構造。
meanings.english_definition: (Ornithology) A primitive syrinx; the most basic form of the syrinx structure located at the junction of the trachea and bronchi in birds.

examples.sentence: The archocystosyrinx is found in some of the most basal bird lineages.
examples.translation: 始原的な鳴管は、最も基底的な鳥類の系統群の一部に見られる。

etymology.value: archo- (原始的な) + cysto- (嚢胞) + syrinx (鳴管)
